verbose_text: The results indicated that phosphorylation of FGFR1 and ERK1/2 were stimulated by FGF21 overexpression, and FGFR1 inhibitor, PD166866 attenuated the stimulated effect of FGF21 on phosphorylated ERK1/2 (XREF_FIG), indicating that ERK1/2 should be activated during the phosphorylation of FGFR1, as stimulated by FGF21.
